meanings.definition: Cyprus: an island country in the eastern Mediterranean Sea
meanings.sent1: Many tourists visit the beautiful cypruses for their summer vacations.
meanings.sent2: I dream of exploring the sandy beaches of the cypruses one day.
meanings.sent3: The cypruses decided to throw a party for all the neighboring islands.
meanings.sent4: The cypruses stood tall like guardians in the Mediterranean Sea.
meanings.sent5: The cypruses shimmered under the Mediterranean sun, inviting travelers from afar.

meanings.definition: Cyprus: a type of coniferous tree
meanings.sent1: The forest was filled with fragrant cypruses swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: I planted a row of cypruses along the garden path for shade.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid its acorns in the cypruses' branches.
meanings.sent4: The cypruses whispered secrets to each other in the quiet forest.
meanings.sent5: The ancient cypruses stood as silent witnesses to the passing of time.

meanings.definition: Cyprus: the plural form of Cyprus, referring to multiple instances of the country or tree
meanings.sent1: The cypruses in the Mediterranean Sea are diverse in culture and landscape.
meanings.sent2: I have visited many cypruses around the world, each with its own charm.
meanings.sent3: The cypruses gathered for a global summit to discuss environmental issues.
meanings.sent4: In my dreams, I traveled to a land of endless cypruses under starlit skies.
meanings.sent5: The cypruses symbolize unity and strength in their collective presence.
